document_data.name: Jott
document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/Breath of the Yellow Rose|34}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Jott''' was an agent of [[Thylius Caramitru]] in [[Mulmaster]].
document_data.Activities: In [[1491 DR]], Jott and his brother [[Rolo]] were the main agents of Thylius, running for him the [[Yellow Breath Chapter House]]. However, an adventuring party hired to find some missing noblewomen entered the house and defeated Jott.{{Cite adventurers league/Breath of the Yellow Rose|27}}
